definition: Qarhan Salt Lake in west Qinghai
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: Qarhan Salt Lake has an elevation of 2, 670 meters.
Qarhan Salt Lake is a typical closed lake in the dry Qaidam basin.
sentences.chinese: 柴達木盆地的察爾汗鹽湖是典型的乾旱地區封閉湖泊。
